title: "Claims AI can boost workplace diversity are 'spurious and dangerous'"
excerpt: "Recent years have seen the emergence of AI tools marketed as an answer to lack of diversity in the workforce, from use of chatbots and CV scrapers to line up prospective candidates, through to analysis software for video interviews."
